TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 260
TEI.2.document_title: S Hatch to Stephen F Austin, 11-25-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: S. Hatch to Austin, September 25, 1829. Application for land. Economic condition of immigrants.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 260

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*S. Hatch to Austin, September 25, 1829. Application for land. Economic condition of immigrants.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I was in *location_mentioned*St Philapey*/location_mentioned* a few dais Sins But your Situashun was Sutch I did not think prudent to visett you I am In hops Sir that I may hear Shortley of your Recuvry— I have ariv with My *person_mentioned*Familey*/person_mentioned* and am Destitute of any plase to put them in—*person_mentioned*Mrs. Hatch*/person_mentioned* is in a Bad State of helth and was *date_mentioned n="09-21-1829">fore dais past*/date_mentioned* delivered of a *person_mentioned*Child*/person_mentioned* makes me Certrianley anxious to put up Some *location_mentioned*Buildings */location_mentioned*and to prepare for a Crop as Soon as I Can doo that I wish to Return to *location_mentioned*Louisiana */location_mentioned*its My wish to Settle Some whare on the *location_mentioned*Nevedad */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*Corenkeway Bayo*/location_mentioned* Should I not hear from you I shall go on down and put up Some Ruff *location_mentioned*Cabins */location_mentioned*allso have anther man thats here with me Should I Make a Sitution that mite Intarfeare with Lans that you or the *person_mentioned*Commishioner*/person_mentioned*—wishes to take it will be arraind to your Satisfaction*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Silvanus Hatch*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-25-1829">25 of Sept 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Colonel Stephen Austoon*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St. Philapey*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
